activities: Flowserve receives personal information from Flowserve's affiliated companies in the European Union.  The information is used for employment related purposes and services, including the evaluation of employee's compensation and benefit plans and Flowserve's general business activities including procurement, fulfullment and customer and supplier relationship management.
contacttitle1: Vice President, Global Comp & Benefits, Labor & Employee Relations
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources
recoursemech: Flowserve will cooperate with European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs).
